name: Amazing Police Pursuit Car 3d
description:
You have played many games where you are chasing thief as a police officer, now for your fun we are switching sides where you are a thief and police is behind you. Game have the beautiful city environment, smooth controls and realistic sound effects.
You are a thief who stole precious diamond from highly secured place now police is behind you and you not only have to save that diamond but also have to save yourself. In this game where you will get the chance to beat the police, now is time show your true driving skills and beat the police. In this game you have to go as fast as you can and get rid of those police officers. To the police high speed cars not only you need good speedy cars but you also need best driving skills because you are surrounded by police. Like the cleverest thief if you want to beat the police you have to be smartest than police. You have the advantage of traffic you can produce fear on the roads and create hurdles for police so you can get rid of police easily. Drive the cars incredibly and speedily and stunt the police by your car stunts. This game will give you nice experience of thief Vs police.
